name: Flockjay
headline: AI-driven learning, content, and coaching for sales teams
description: Flockjay is an AI-powered platform for sales teams looking to get the knowledge they need, when they need it, to close more deals. We combine learning, content, and performance management in one place, so teams can effectively share best practices, coach faster and more effectively, and drive faster onboarding and productivity times.
tags: industry:artificial-intelligence; industry:saas; industry:elearning; industry:productivity; industry:sales; location:san-francisco-bay-area

# Magically simplify sales enablement with AI
Flockjay lets you easily manage your sales teams’ content, learning, deal insights, coaching, & more - with the help of Generative AI.
[Book Demo](https://flockjay.com/<./request-demo>)
[Book Demo](https://flockjay.com/<./request-demo>)

# The generative enablement platform that’s magically simple, adoptable, and engaging
Flockjay is a modern, unified Learning and Content Management System for all your sales enablement needs, with generative AI and 50+ integrations that bring the right knowledge to the right people, at the right time.
#### Trusted by these companies and more
  * ![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/73seoIYIxeAwxG228zkIGPaUM.svg)

### What does modern sales enablement look like?
The AI Sales Revolution is here. We need to keep our GTM teams on the knife’s edge of best practices to avoid falling behind in the race to win more deals and build meaningful customer relationships.
[Learn about our philosophy](https://flockjay.com/<./our-philosophy>)
[Learn about our philosophy](https://flockjay.com/<./our-philosophy>)
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/Mhs5hVNMy0BFcRKoJvHbdHR8NY.svg)
#### AI-Driven Content Management
Blazing fast semantic search, content tagging, and organization, all powered by Flockjay AI.
[Learn More](https://flockjay.com/<./product/sales-content-management>)
[Learn More](https://flockjay.com/<./product/sales-content-management>)
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/t14IuKg49CsCXNRDQQnmsYqv9g.svg)
#### The First Modern, End-to-End Learning Platform
Intuitive UI, automations, and peer learning to scale your training.
[Learn More](https://flockjay.com/<./product/learning-capture-and-management>)
[Learn More](https://flockjay.com/<./product/learning-capture-and-management>)
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/skMXVhhUb9I6KKuDPEpDQ01c7XE.svg)
#### Real-time, Automated Coaching for Every Deal and Rep
Bring the right enablement to the right rep at the right time in the deal.
[Learn More](https://flockjay.com/<./product/performance-management-and-real-time-coaching>)
[Learn More](https://flockjay.com/<./product/performance-management-and-real-time-coaching>)
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/Td3jmBGhnGal6G285oTgLuNYI.svg)
#### Do More Enablement With Less Resources, Using Flockjay
Score calls, grade pitches, and surface the most relevant collateral. In under 5 seconds.
[Learn More](https://flockjay.com/<./product/flockjay-ai>)
[Learn More](https://flockjay.com/<./product/flockjay-ai>)
### "I don't know of a single sales team that doesn't need the Flockjay platform. I've been at the biggest sales orgs – Salesforce, Microsoft, IBM. None of them have this."
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/enlKUikp5qjUOb9XtEJTzxVmsA.jpeg)
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/enlKUikp5qjUOb9XtEJTzxVmsA.jpeg)

DP Brightful

![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/IhQRLthWSINr7AlD4oV9tVoeA.svg)
#### Sales Leaders
Don’t let lessons learned from past deals slip away. Understand your customer, sales cycles, and win themes with precision by promoting the best win stories. Be ready for the next opportunity.
[Learn More](https://flockjay.com/<./solutions/for-sales-leaders>)
[Learn More](https://flockjay.com/<./solutions/for-sales-leaders>)
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/RVB4PIoWoFTVtAcmLZNisidNZ8w.svg)
#### Revenue Operations
There are many strategies for increasing deal velocity, win rates, and deal size. But only one uses the winning strategies your team already knows. Empower your team to optimize execution.
[Learn More](https://flockjay.com/<./solutions/for-revenue-operations>)
[Learn More](https://flockjay.com/<./solutions/for-revenue-operations>)
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/AtYh8Rd5TQcNY6sS73XiCAtRPBM.svg)
#### Sales Enablement
Dramatically increase the speed and quality of team training. Automate knowledge capture workflows, build interactive courses and certifications with powerful authoring tools, and scale winning strategies that reps can implement on Day 1.
[Learn More](https://flockjay.com/<./solutions/for-sales-enablement-and-training>)
[Learn More](https://flockjay.com/<./solutions/for-sales-enablement-and-training>)

generated_description:
Flockjay is a forward-thinking company based in San Francisco, founded in 2018 and part of Y Combinator Batch W19. With a compact team of 12 employees led by Group Partner Michael Seibel, Flockjay is on a mission to transform sales training through AI-driven learning and content management. 

At its core, Flockjay is an AI-powered platform that enhances the productivity of sales teams by providing instant access to crucial knowledge. It seamlessly integrates learning, coaching, and performance management into a single, user-friendly system. The platform is designed to enable quicker onboarding, efficient coaching, and effective sharing of best practices among team members.

Flockjay offers a "generative enablement platform" that not only simplifies sales enablement but also adapts to the specific needs of sales teams. With features like real-time coaching, automated performance assessments, and a robust content management system, Flockjay positions itself as an essential tool for modern sales organizations. 

Their innovative approach has attracted the attention of notable companies in the tech space, solidifying their reputation as a go-to resource for sales teams looking to gain a competitive edge. You can learn more about their offerings and schedule a demo via their website: [Flockjay](https://flockjay.com).

In summary, Flockjay is not just another player in the sales tech landscape; it’s a game-changer. By harnessing the power of AI and integrating it with effective training methodologies, Flockjay is setting a new standard for what sales enablement can and should be. If you’re in sales and you’re not considering Flockjay, you might just be leaving money on the table.
